location: The Ponderosa, The Villa, Dubai
description: Looking to rent a very spacious villa with a private swimming pool? Exclusive Links Real Estate has in portfolio this Marbella style villa in Ponderosa area of The Villa.  The villa is located on a very large plot of around 13,000 sq. ft and has been extended, reaching around 10,000 sq. ft BUA.  On the ground floor, there is the living and dining room, the kitchen with an informal seating area, one en-suite bedroom and a study, the maid room with laundry area. The living room has full glass doors towards the garden and the swimming pool. The porch at the back of the house makes a very cosy seating area.  On the first floor, there is the master bedroom, with walk-in closet and a bathroom that has both a shower and bathtub. There are other 3 en-suite bedrooms with bathtubs and a family room that was extended onto the upper terrace.  Highlights of the property: * Plot 13,145.21 sq. ft.  * Extended family room upstairs * Private pool * Automatic gates * Walking distance to the Ponderosa Retail center.  For this property and other properties in The Villa, contact Clementina Kongslund, who has lived there for 12 years.  ------- Development Details ------- The Villa DubaiÂ is comprised of a collection of beautifully designed Spanish style villas that is among the best residential properties there is in the Emirate of Dubai.  Located in Dubailand, The Villa is created and developed by a well-established land developer, Dubai Properties (DP) and sub-developed by Mazaya. This collection of Dubai villas is ideally set in a secure community that assures its residents a tranquil and peaceful living experience. Going around the city is easy since The Villa is easily accessible by Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Road and Emirates Road, two of the major roads in the city.
